array.string: Running is the greatest metaphor for life, because you get out of it what you put into it.
One run can change your day, many runs can change your life.
After all, if you run far enough, no one can catch you.
If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
Get going … walk if you have to, but finish the damned race.
Someone who is busier than you is running right now.
Someday you won’t be able to do this. Today is not that day.
I’m not telling you it’s going to be easy… I’m telling you it’s going to be worth it.
Running is therapy anyone can afford.
Your body is made to move so move it.
Run hard when it’s hard to run.
